title: When your teammate picks Aatrox & claims he's M7, so you think it's all good
body:
But then you remembered that Aatrox's rework was just released **yesterday**.

https://imgur.com/Bu3PzcB

replies.body: And then four minutes into the game he goes "Wait they reworked Aatrox?"

AA-trox got demoted to Unreliable Atrox

At least Yasuo is near guaranteed to reach his 0/10 powerspike

> [{quoted}](name=Beacon Academy,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=7p0vEuNe,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2018-06-30T15:11:30.856+0000)
>
> AA-trox got demoted to Unreliable Atrox
> 
> At least Yasuo is near guaranteed to reach his 0/10 powerspike

Nah it's AoE-Atrox
I'd trust a master 7 {{champion:92}} over a mastery 7 {{champion:266}} currently

> [{quoted}](name=kargish,realm=EUW,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=7p0vEuNe,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-06-30T14:14:47.003+0000)
>
> I'd trust a master 7 {{champion:92}} over a mastery 7 {{champion:266}} currently

My favorite is the mastery 7 thresh who hits one hook total in a game and says "predicted" while they've only been throwing them straight in front of them

> [{quoted}](name=kargish,realm=EUW,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=7p0vEuNe,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-06-30T14:14:47.003+0000)
>
> I'd trust a master 7 {{champion:92}} over a mastery 7 {{champion:266}} currently

What's the difference? They're practically the same champ
ONLY TRUE ASCENDEDS  WOULD REALIZE THIS
Exactly what happened to me with the old Urgot, I miss my M7 Urgod.
Same face when they pick Aatrox at all. Horrible rework.
Ugh I felt the same way when they reworked Graves. I had Mastery 5 and very little understanding on how he worked, let alone jungle since that's what he was most capable of at the time.
